contentrichtext.text: {{Refimprove|date=November 2009}} '''House of Milan''' (HOM) was a successful publisher of [[bondage magazine]]s and [[BDSM]] videos, that was mostly run by [[fetish photographer]] and producer [[Barbara Behr]]. HOM was considered one of the three big houses during the so-called Golden Age of Bondage productions, along with Harmony Communications (later renamed to Harmony Concepts) and California Star (Calstar) from approximately the mid 1970s to the late 1990s. House of Milan was sold to Lyndon Distributors who occasionally reprints and reissues some of the magazines and films of HOM when it was an active company.
